formElement.label: Destination Directory:
formElement.documentation: Path where the coverage report will be stored.

formElement.label: Dump Detailed Report:
formElement.documentation: Generates detailed report info to stdout.

formElement.label: Dump Summary:
formElement.documentation: Generates plain text summary to stdout.

formElement.label: Dump Coverage Report:
formElement.documentation: Generates coverage report info to stdout.

formElement.label: Dump Execution Count Report:
formElement.documentation: Generates the execution count report info to stdout.

formElement.label: Minimum Threshold:
formElement.documentation: Minimum allowed percentage of coverage allowed in the analysis.

formElement.label: Compare Code Coverage Analysis:
formElement.documentation: Compare code coverage to another specified file, default compares to coverage.info.

formElement.label: Code Coverage File to Compare:
formElement.documentation: File which will be compared differentially with the target analysis.

formElement.label: Target(s):
formElement.documentation: Files to be included in the coverage analysis. Every paths must be quoted. When providing multiple targets, separate each target with a space. You can add wildcards to any path using *.

formElement.label: Save Results:
formElement.documentation: Saves coverage data to a file.

formElement.label: Additional Commands for rcov:
formElement.documentation: Additional commands to be entered for rcov.

formElement.label: Additional Target Commands:
formElement.documentation: Additional commands to be entered for the target
